section.heading: Conversion to a for-profit entity.
section.text: A corporation issued a certificate of authority under this chapter shall not be converted into a stock corporation, partnership, limited liability company, or other business entity organized for profit.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 14-297 rewrote subsec. (b)(2) which had read as follows: “(2) Fails to comply with §§ 31-4405, 31-4410 through 31-4415, 31-4421, 31-4424, 31-4428, 31-4431, and 31-4441;”
D.C. Law 15-56, in subsec. (b), substituted “company not involving a nonprofit hospital service plan or medical service plan unless” for “company unless”, and added subsec. (b-1).
